"""Tests for mock_problem."""
from pathlib import Path
from rosalind_problems.problems.mock_problem import main
from rosalind_problems.utils import testing_utils

FIXTURES = Path("tests/test_problems/test_mock_problem/fixtures")

def test_mock_problem():
	"""TEST - main function of mock_problem solved the sample problem."""
	sample_dataset, sample_solution = testing_utils.get_samples(FIXTURES)
	assert main.mock_problem(sample_dataset) == sample_solution
